lead_paragraph: On the next-to-last day, Contador lost ground to Fabio Aru, who closed the gap to 2 minutes 2 seconds.

headline.print_headline: Contador’s Edge Is Cut in Giro d’Italia
headline.main: Alberto Contador’s Lead Cut at Giro d’Italia

snippet: On the next-to-last day, Contador lost ground to Fabio Aru, who closed the gap to 2 minutes 2 seconds.
abstract: Fabio Aru wins 20th stage of Giro d'Italia bicycle race; Alberto Contador retains overall lead.
